com.mapdigit.gis.navigation

Class SimulatedDirectionLocationProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapdigit.gis.location.LocationProvider
      • com.mapdigit.gis.navigation.SimulatedDirectionLocationProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class SimulatedDirectionLocationProvider
extends LocationProvider
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Simulation location provider, it uses current route as the simulation source.

    © Copyright 2009 Guidebee Pty Ltd.

      • startSimulation

        public void startSimulation(MapDirection mapDirection,
                   int speed,
                   boolean isMile)
        Start simualtion
        Parameters:
        mapDirection - map direction object, cannot be null.
        speed - simulation driving speed in kph or mile/h
        isMile - is mile or not.

      • pauseSimulation

        pause simulation.

      • stopSimulation

        public void stopSimulation()
        force to stop simulation.

      • setDeviation

        public void setDeviation(int value)
        set the deviation value, if not zero, the simulated location will have deviation with a random value with a circle with radius of value from it's exact location.
        Parameters:
        value - the deviation value in meters.
